answers.answer: I worry about having a huge baby too! I started off 139 and now i'm 176 and only 27 weeks I feel like I've gained so much and my baby will be ginormous!!

It just depends. A big baby isn't always the case. I gained 80lbs with my first child, and she was average size for a baby girl. She weighed 7lbs 1oz at birth. So the weight you gain doesn't always mean you will have a big baby

I had a 9 pound baby girl last November. I weighed 135 pounds before I got pregnant and I weighed 200 pounds when I had her. Now im pregnant and due in July. But im just worried about if its going to be healthy. I dont mind if i have another 9 pounder

Im a short girl and im 31 weeks today im due january 18th. And i currently 170 and i gained so much but it does not mean your over weight or your baby will be huge. I just went to the doctors today and my baby boy is not big and i look like im having twins. It all just depends on the individual person, my sister just had a baby last month and through out her pregnancy no one knew she was pregnant and she had a huge baby. So it just depends on yourself. Just ask your doctor, your doctor should tell you how big your baby is right now.

I gained 37lbs with my first and he was 7lbs2oz when delivered at 35wks. This time ive only gained 12lbs and am delivering next week at 36wks and baby was measuring in the 83rd percentile at last scan. I just have big babies, doesn't seem to matter how much weight I gain. I think with my first it was mostly icecream and McDonald's, lol.

I gained alot too its nice hearing other people talk about it so i k ow im not that only one lol but i went from about 140 to 210 with my first and he was just under 8 pounds. Then with my second i started at 155-160 and now im 177 and im almost 28 weeks. But they saod she will be tall i hope she comes out big

I gained alot too its nice hearing other people talk about it so i k ow im not that only one lol but i went from about 140 to 210 with my first and he was just under 8 pounds. Then with my second i started at 155-160 and now im 177 and im almost 28 weeks. But they saod she will be tall i hope she comes out big
With my first pregnancy I only gained 17lbs and my son was 10.1lbs and 23in long. Every womans body carries their pregnancy different.

With my daughter in 2010 I went from 125 pounds to 200 pds due to preeclampsia. Whe I had her at 39 weeks exactly she weighed 8pds & 13oz. . . With this baby I started at 140 & now i'm at about 180, bol. Idk how much he is weighing tho' . . .

I gained 52 pounds and had an 8.13 baby. It doesn't mean you will have a big baby. But even if you do. Don't listen to doctors, your body can birth your child no matter what size, you just might need to try different positions

question: So this is going to be my second son and im a due January 21st 2015. i started out at 144lbs and i am currently 175.4lbs. everytime i see someone or post a picture on facebook everyone keeps saying how huge i am, asking if im having the baby soon, if its twins or whatever they can come up with then they say imma have a big baby is that true at all? my first son was 5lbs 13oz 21 inches. and my ending weight was 204lbs. and started off at 134lbs. (but was also born with bilateral clubfoot)
title: Big Baby!??
